titleStmt.title: A true relation of a most barbarous and bloody murder lately committed on the body of Mr. Tho. Clarke, minister and school-master in the parish of St. Margarets Westminster

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Wallis in White-Fryers near the grear [sic] gate in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
